title: School Bully 2
author: sWooZie
description:
A lot of you guys are going back to school this week; I recently heard some news about a guy who made going to school even more of a nightmare than it already is. 

Had to deal with Jake as well as Johnathan (from the first School Bully vid) at the same time so the two stories overlap at some points. 

Had a few requests for the animatic stick figure animation style- don't worry they're still here. For those of you who like the high quality stuff fromm the last Disney vid don't worry either... I'll be switching between the two styles in the upcoming vids.

My Entertainment Weekly interview on bullying: https://ew.com/article/2015/10/31/stream-con-swoozie-bullying/ 

ig: http://www.instagram.com/swoozie/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@swoozieftw

Art by:
Bandit
